training_data.prompt:
Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. HELLO-WORLD.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
DATA DIVISION.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    DISPLAY 'Hello, World!'.
    STOP RUN.

Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. CALCULATE-DISCOUNT.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
DATA DIVISION.
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
01 WS-QUANTITY PIC 9(5).
01 WS-PRICE PIC 9(5)V99.
01 WS-TOTAL PIC 9(7)V99.
01 WS-DISCOUNT PIC 9(3)V99.
01 WS-DISCOUNTED-TOTAL PIC 9(7)V99.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    DISPLAY 'Enter quantity: '.
    ACCEPT WS-QUANTITY.
    DISPLAY 'Enter price: '.
    ACCEPT WS-PRICE.
    COMPUTE WS-TOTAL = WS-QUANTITY * WS-PRICE.
    IF WS-TOTAL > 1000
        COMPUTE WS-DISCOUNT = WS-TOTAL * 0.1
    ELSE
        COMPUTE WS-DISCOUNT = WS-TOTAL * 0.05
    END-IF.
    COMPUTE WS-DISCOUNTED-TOTAL = WS-TOTAL - WS-DISCOUNT.
    DISPLAY 'Total: $' WS-TOTAL.
    DISPLAY 'Discount: $' WS-DISCOUNT.
    DISPLAY 'Discounted Total: $' WS-DISCOUNTED-TOTAL.
    STOP RUN.

Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. LOOP-EXAMPLE.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
DATA DIVISION.
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
01 WS-COUNTER PIC 9(2) VALUE 1.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    PERFORM 5 TIMES
        DISPLAY 'Counter: ' WS-COUNTER
        ADD 1 TO WS-COUNTER
    END-PERFORM
    STOP RUN.

Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. FILE-READ-EXAMPLE.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
INPUT-OUTPUT SECTION.
FILE-CONTROL.
    SELECT EMPLOYEE-FILE ASSIGN TO 'employees.txt'
        ORGANIZATION IS LINE SEQUENTIAL.
DATA DIVISION.
FILE SECTION.
FD EMPLOYEE-FILE.
01 EMPLOYEE-RECORD.
    05 EMPLOYEE-NAME PIC X(20).
    05 EMPLOYEE-ID PIC 9(5).
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
01 WS-EOF PIC A(1).
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    OPEN INPUT EMPLOYEE-FILE
    PERFORM UNTIL WS-EOF = 'Y'
        READ EMPLOYEE-FILE
            AT END
                MOVE 'Y' TO WS-EOF
            NOT AT END
                DISPLAY EMPLOYEE-NAME ' - ' EMPLOYEE-ID
        END-READ
    END-PERFORM
    CLOSE EMPLOYEE-FILE
    STOP RUN.

Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. STRING-EXAMPLE.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
DATA DIVISION.
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
01 WS-STRING1 PIC X(10) VALUE 'Hello'.
01 WS-STRING2 PIC X(10) VALUE 'World'.
01 WS-RESULT PIC X(20).
01 WS-LENGTH PIC 99.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    STRING WS-STRING1 DELIMITED BY SPACE
           ' ' DELIMITED BY SIZE
           WS-STRING2 DELIMITED BY SPACE
           INTO WS-RESULT
    END-STRING
    INSPECT WS-RESULT TALLYING WS-LENGTH FOR CHARACTERS
        BEFORE INITIAL SPACE
    DISPLAY 'Combined: ' WS-RESULT
    DISPLAY 'Length of first word: ' WS-LENGTH
    STOP RUN.
training_data.completion:
Here's the Go equivalent:

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
)

func main() {
	string1 := "Hello"
	string2 := "World"

	result := string1 + " " + string2
	fmt.Printf("Combined: %s\n", result)

	lengthOfFirstWord := len(strings.TrimSpace(string1))
	fmt.Printf("Length of first word: %d\n", lengthOfFirstWord)
}

training_data.prompt:
Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. TABLE-EXAMPLE.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
DATA DIVISION.
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
01 SALES-TABLE.
    05 SALES OCCURS 5 TIMES PIC 9(5)V99.
01 TOTAL-SALES PIC 9(7)V99.
01 I PIC 9.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    MOVE 1000.00 TO SALES(1)
    MOVE 2000.50 TO SALES(2)
    MOVE 1500.75 TO SALES(3)
    MOVE 3000.25 TO SALES(4)
    MOVE 2500.00 TO SALES(5)
    MOVE 0 TO TOTAL-SALES
    PERFORM VARYING I FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL I > 5
        ADD SALES(I) TO TOTAL-SALES
    END-PERFORM
    DISPLAY 'Total Sales: $' TOTAL-SALES
    STOP RUN.

Translate the following COBOL code to Go:

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. SALES-REPORT.
ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
DATA DIVISION.
WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
01 SALES-DATA.
    05 PRODUCT-NAME PIC X(20) OCCURS 3 TIMES.
    05 SALES-AMOUNT PIC 9(5)V99 OCCURS 3 TIMES.
01 TOTAL-SALES PIC 9(7)V99.
01 AVERAGE-SALE PIC 9(5)V99.
01 I PIC 9.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
    MOVE 'Product A' TO PRODUCT-NAME(1)
    MOVE 'Product B' TO PRODUCT-NAME(2)
    MOVE 'Product C' TO PRODUCT-NAME(3)
    MOVE 1500.50 TO SALES-AMOUNT(1)
    MOVE 2300.75 TO SALES-AMOUNT(2)
    MOVE 1800.25 TO SALES-AMOUNT(3)
    MOVE 0 TO TOTAL-SALES
    PERFORM VARYING I FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL I > 3
        ADD SALES-AMOUNT(I) TO TOTAL-SALES
        DISPLAY PRODUCT-NAME(I) ' Sales: $' SALES-AMOUNT(I)
    END-PERFORM
    COMPUTE AVERAGE-SALE = TOTAL-SALES / 3
    DISPLAY 'Total Sales: $' TOTAL-SALES
    DISPLAY 'Average Sale: $' AVERAGE-SALE
    STOP RUN.
